name: Popping Balloons
description:
Oh no my party is ruined, the balloons are on the loss and are flying around, help me pop them to avoid them from touching the power line. But don't destroy the red one, it possesses no harm, it is an imposter and destroying it remove +1 balloon warning light leaving it to Yellow, if it happens again it leaves red until game over.

When the game starts, just touch the balloons and avoid destroying any red colored balloon.

Speed is constantly updated, try doing it fast else Game Over.

Please support Liki Games your support will go a long way by taking this Game to Google play store which its developers account cost 25$

Thanks for paying.
